content.description: “Up! up! my Friend and quit your books;
content.question: Let nature be your teacher. One impulse from a vernal wood May teach you more of man, Of moral evil and of good Than all the sages can. Enough of Science and of Art; Come forth, and bring with you a heart.” The poem above reflects which of the following?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
